about_the_game:
Usage tutorial:
1. Download IVCAM together with your phone and computer（ ）

2. Turn on both the phone and computer's ivcam together, and it can automatically recognize and connect to the same wifi. The phone serves as the camera

3. The placement of the phone can refer to promotional videos, and other angles are also acceptable. The special effects position and depth can be adjusted by oneself to find the position that is suitable for the piano

4. Connect the piano to the computer and connect it with MIDI cable (this midi cable is the most suitable one after testing. Purchase connection and )

5. Finally, open the Magic Piano software

6. Wasdqe is used to control the endpoints on both sides of a special effect, which is used to move the position of the effect. Wasd is the movement of the plane, and qe is the movement of the depth before and after. When the software is first opened, the special effect is to present the appearance of piano keys,
which are used to align with real piano keys when moving. Pressing the H key can hide them. The Tab key can hide the control interface on the right.

The ivcam camera comes with a watermark. If you mind, you can remove it by purchasing a membership in ivcam. Link: After opening, click on the app store. The first product is the ivcam mobile camera. After purchasing, you can remove the ivcam watermark


An innovative music visualization tool designed for pianists. Through the interaction with the piano keyboard, the software can generate special effects in real time, add visual elements to the performance, and create a multi-sensory music experience.

Software features:
1. Real-time special effects generation: every time you press the piano key, the software will trigger the corresponding special effects to ensure that the visual effects are synchronized with the music.
2. Customized special effects: users can adjust the style, color and animation effects of the special effects according to their personal preferences.
3. Compatibility: the software is suitable for a variety of computer operating systems, and there is no need to worry about compatibility.
4, easy to operate: the user interface is simple and intuitive, even beginners can get started quickly.

Use the scene:
1. Stage performance: provide unforgettable visual support for live performances.
2. Music teaching: help students better understand the rhythm and dynamics of music.
3. Personal entertainment: add fun when practicing piano at home.

Technical features:
High-performance algorithms ensure the fluency of special effects generation without delay.
The optimized code ensures that the software runs stably and takes up less system resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
